actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: To suspend until January 1, 1996, the duty on certain machinery.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1995, the duty on: (1) roto textile spinning machinery; (2) rotary screen print machinery; (3) airjet weaving machines for weaving fabrics of a width exceeding 30 cm; and (4) projectile looms for weaving fabrics of a width exceeding 30 cm.

titles.title: To suspend until January 1, 1996, the duty on certain machinery.
